name: SurviVille TD
description:
This was my first game written in Unity. Looking back, it's pretty bad. 

Collect resources during the day. Zombies come out at night and are trying to destroy your town center.

Controls: Use the mouse for everything. Pay attention to the HUD (top and bottom) and popups. Move the mouse to the edge of the screen to move the map. 

You have a population limit, so build houses. Archers come from the barracks so the sooner you build one of those the better. Churches produce priests that can heal your units. Workers collect resources, build buildings, and repair buildings.
